E.g. a primary sector conglomerate: mine bitcoins with WA hydro dam energy, use revenue to buy diesel for silver mining operation in Mexico.
Bitcoin is also an energy arbitrage vehicle. It "absorbs" ubiquitous energy via mining, and then "releases" it where energy is more scarce.
Indirectly: econ actors who store data less securely will be hurt or crippled by ransomware attacks, benefiting robust competitors.
Directly: Bitcoin moves wealth from people who store their coins less securely, via loss or theft, to people who store them more securely.
Bitcoin is a security arbitrage vehicle, moving wealth from vulnerable to robust environments.
